languages.text: "Я буду ждать вас в штабе на офицерской палубе, где введу вас в курс дела".
"I will await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."
languages.original_text: "Я буду ждать вас в штабе на офицерской палубе, где введу вас в курс дела".

traits.locale_text: "I will wait for your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."
"I will wait for your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."
"I shall await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."
"I shall await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."
"I will await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."
"I will await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."

languages.text: «Esperaré su visita en el cuartel de la cubierta de oficiales para informarl{mf|e|a} sobre nuestro progreso».
languages.original_text: "I will await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."

traits.locale_text: «Esperaré su visita en el cuartel de la cubierta de oficiales para informarl{mf|e|a} sobre nuestro progreso».

languages.text: 「現在の進捗状況を説明いたしますので、士官デッキの司令部で到着をお待ちしています」
languages.original_text: "I will await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."

traits.locale_text: 「現在の進捗状況を説明いたしますので、士官デッキの司令部で到着をお待ちしています」

languages.text: “我会在军官甲板的调查总部等待您的到来，向您汇报我们目前的进展。”
languages.original_text: "I will await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."

traits.locale_text: “我会在军官甲板的调查总部等待您的到来，向您汇报我们目前的进展。”

languages.text: "Ich warte im Hauptquartier auf dem Offiziersdeck auf Eure Ankunft und informiere Euch dann über unsere aktuellen Fortschritte."
languages.original_text: "I will await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."

traits.locale_text: "Ich warte im Hauptquartier auf dem Offiziersdeck auf Eure Ankunft und informiere Euch dann über unsere aktuellen Fortschritte."

languages.text: « Je vous attendrai au quartier général situé sur le pont des officiers pour vous informer de la progression de l'enquête. »
languages.original_text: "I will await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous attendrai au quartier général situé sur le pont des officiers pour vous informer de la progression de l'enquête. »

languages.text: "İçinde bulunduğumuz mevcut aşama konusunda sizi bilgilendirmek üzere subay güvertesindeki merkezde gelişinizi bekliyor olacağım."
languages.original_text: "I will await your arrival at the headquarters on the officers' deck to brief you on our current progress."
